title: Game keeps freezing my computer as soon as I get into a game
body: Yesterday there was a pretty sizable Windows 10 update and since then I have been unable to enter a game without my whole computer freezing, meaning I cannot even ctrl-alt-delete or anything, it just completely freezes. Also, before the game freezes, a really loud crackling noise occurs and that's when I know it is about to freeze. Anybody have any ideas on what's going on here?

replies.body: I came here to report the same problem

This issue is generally caused by the Xbox Game DVR feature that was packaged inside of the Windows 10 Anniversary update. I recommend disabling it entirely using [this guide](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if anything changes.

Let me know if this helped.
Yes this fixed the problem... thanks a lot!

OH THANK YOU.  This was driving me nuts, I could not figure out what was going on.  Was crazy, friends were spectating me and for them the entire game was frozen too. But not their computer, just me mid-step in fountain.  But thank you, now I can play!
